explains: adj. 看得清的，觉察得出的

sentences.en: His face was barely discernible in the gloom.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗中很难看得清他的脸。

sentences.en: Far away the outline of the island is just discernible.
sentences.cn: 远远的，那岛的轮廓依稀可见。

sentences.en: There is often no discernible difference between rival brands.
sentences.cn: 相互竞争的品牌之间往往看不出明显的区别。
